se.westpay.posapplib

Interface PrintJob


  • public interface PrintJob
    Manages a print job. Use printTextLine(String, String, String, boolean, boolean), and printImage(Bitmap) repeatedly until everything has been printed. Complete the print job by calling finish().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PrinterStatus finish()
      Finishes the print job.
      int getMonospaceWidth() 
      int getPrintWidth() 
      PrinterStatus getStatus() 
      boolean printImage(Bitmap image)
      Prints a bitmap.
      boolean printTextLine(java.lang.String left, java.lang.String center, java.lang.String right, boolean monospace, boolean bold)
      Prints one line of text.

    • Method Detail

      • getMonospaceWidth

        int getMonospaceWidth()
        Returns:
        The number of monospace characters that can fit on one line.

      • getPrintWidth

        int getPrintWidth()
        Returns:
        Return number of dots per print line.

      • getStatus

        PrinterStatus getStatus()
        Returns:
        The current printer status.

      • printTextLine

        boolean printTextLine(java.lang.String left,
                      java.lang.String center,
                      java.lang.String right,
                      boolean monospace,
                      boolean bold)
        Prints one line of text. Text that does not fit on the line is truncated.
        Parameters:
        left - Text that should be left-aligned.
        center - Text that should be center-aligned.
        right - Text that should be right-aligned.
        monospace - True if the text should be printed with a monospace font. False if the text should be printed with a variable-width font.
        bold - True if the text should be printed in bold-face.

      • printImage

        boolean printImage(Bitmap image)
        Prints a bitmap.
        Parameters:
        image - A bitmap to print.
        Returns:
        True if successful, otherwise false.

      • finish

        PrinterStatus finish()
        Finishes the print job.
